title: Expanse - Turn Thoughts into Reality
description:
We've reimagined software through the philosophical understanding of awareness and how to use it to connect humans and AI in frictionless harmony.

We take your fleeting thoughts and manifest them into the world through a community, full-stack apps, physical products, auto-run businesses, etc. Anything your curiosities dream up.

It all happens on an infinitely customizable canvas built for AI, not just humans. 

The future human-AI partnership will be played in the Expanse of Awareness.
